comment.author: 77345821@N06
comment._content: These are members of the Escadrille des Voluntaires, later called Escadrille Americaine, and still later the Escadrille Lafayette. They are Sgt. Elliot Cowdin, Lt. De Laage de Meux, Capt. Georges Thenault, and Lt. William Thaw. Thaw would serve with the group since its inception as one of the founding members and continue as leader during its handover to American Service as it became the 103rd Aero Squadron in 1918.
